fr.upmc.datacenter.software.applicationvm.interfaces

Interface ApplicationVMManagementI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationVM, ApplicationVMManagementConnector, ApplicationVMManagementInboundPort, ApplicationVMManagementOutboundPort

    public interface ApplicationVMManagementI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface ApplicationVMManagementI defines the methods to manage an application virtual machine component.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

        void allocateCores(Computer.AllocatedCore[] allocatedCores)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        allocate cores to the application virtual machine.

        Contract

         pre    allocatedCores != null && allocatedCores.length != 0
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        allocatedCores - array of cores already reserved provided to the VM.

        java.lang.Exception
